meanings.definition: A solution that is rich in positively charged ions.
meanings.sent1: The anolyte contained many positive ions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the anolyte to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: The anolyte was so full of positive ions, it was practically glowing with energy.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like an anolyte, spreading positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The anolyte sparkled like a treasure trove of happiness.

meanings.definition: The electrode in an electrolytic cell where oxidation occurs.
meanings.sent1: During the experiment, they observed the anolyte closely.
meanings.sent2: The anolyte played a crucial role in the electrolytic process.
meanings.sent3: The anolyte seemed to be the life of the electrolytic cell party.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an anolyte, sparking a chain reaction of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The anolyte stood strong, facing the challenges of oxidation with determination.
